akn:section.akn:heading: Terms of class or series determined by board of directors.

akn:content.akn:p: If the articles of incorporation so provide, the board of directors may, without shareholder approval:

If the board of directors acts pursuant to subsection (a) of this section, it shall determine the terms, including the preferences, rights, and limitations, to the same extent permitted under ยง 29-304.01, of:

Before issuing any shares of a class or series created under this section, the corporation shall deliver to the Mayor for filing articles of amendment setting forth the terms determined under subsection (a) and (b) of this section.
